backend/main.mo: Actor storing per-caller conversion history with add and query methods using timestamps and sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing conversion steps, history, and the Share & List tab with social share logic.
frontend/src/appMetadata.ts: Exports appName and appDescription constants for consistent branding.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header showing the app logo, title, and description using centralized metadata.
frontend/src/features/converter/Converte: Form for entering and validating a TikTok URL before starting conversion.
frontend/src/features/converter/Download: Panel handling demo conversion execution, progress, settings summary, and error display.
frontend/src/features/converter/EmptySta: Landing hero with illustration and guidance for starting a TikTok-to-YouTube conversion.
frontend/src/features/converter/PresetPi: UI component rendering selectable video conversion presets using cards and a radio group.
Defines conversion preset types and preset list plus a helper to fetch presets by ID.
frontend/src/features/converter/useMp4Ex: Hook that simulates video conversion progress and generates a demo JPEG frame based on a preset.
frontend/src/features/converter/validato: Validates TikTok URLs, checking domain and path structure.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPan: Displays conversion history in a table with links, metadata, and deletion controls.
frontend/src/features/history/historySto: Manages localStorage CRUD for conversion history entries with a size limit.
frontend/src/features/history/historyTyp: Defines the shape of a conversion history entry.
frontend/src/features/history/useHistory: Combines local and backend history, exposes add/delete operations, and manages syncing.
frontend/src/features/market/ListingSect: UI instructions for listing the app on Caffeine App Market with a link to Caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/features/market/ShareAndLis: Combines sharing utilities and listing section into a single panel.
frontend/src/features/market/ShareUtilit: Provides a link-sharing UI with clipboard copy support and fallback handling.
frontend/src/features/results/ResultsScr: Displays the conversion result with video preview, download/start-over actions, preset details, and YouTube upload guidance.
frontend/src/features/results/uploadGuid: Defines the upload step structure and provides a list of YouTube upload instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a query hook that fetches a user's conversion history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Generates share URLs for Facebook, X, LinkedIn, and email with encoded parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the app.
